languages.text: Кровь в луже странно пузырится и, в нарушение законов природы, отказывается сворачиваться.
The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
languages.original_text: Кровь в луже странно пузырится и, в нарушение законов природы, отказывается сворачиваться.

traits.locale_text: The blood in the puddle is bubbling in an odd way and, contrary to all laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
The blood in the puddle is bubbling in an odd way and, contrary to all laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
The blood in the puddle is bubbling in an odd way and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
The blood in the puddle is bubbling in an odd way and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.
The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

languages.text: Das Blut in der Pfütze scheint zu blubbern, und entgegen aller Gesetze der Natur gerinnt es nicht.
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: Das Blut in der Pfütze blubbert auf eigenartige Weise und gerinnt entgegen aller Gesetze der Natur nicht.

languages.text: Cette flaque de sang bouillonne étrangement... Défiant les lois de la nature, elle semble refuser de coaguler.
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: Cette flaque de sang bouillonne étrangement... Défiant les lois de la nature, elle semble refuser de coaguler.

languages.text: 坑里的鲜血泛着诡异的血泡，迟迟不肯凝固，这显然违背了自然规律。
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: 坑里的鲜血泛着诡异的血泡，迟迟不肯凝固，这显然违背了自然规律。

languages.text: 水たまりの中で血液が泡立っており、さながら自然の法則に逆らって凝固することを拒絶しているようだ。
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: 水たまりの中で血が奇妙にブクブクと泡立ち、自然の法則に逆らって、固まることを拒絶している。

languages.text: La sangre del charco parece burbujear y, desafiando las leyes de la naturaleza, se niega a coagularse.
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: La sangre del charco burbujea de forma extraña y, desafiando las leyes de la naturaleza, se niega a coagularse.

languages.text: Birikintideki kan kabarcıklanıyor ve doğa kanunlara karşı gelircesine pıhtılaşmamakta ısrar ediyor.
languages.original_text: The blood in the puddle seems to be bubbling and, defying the laws of nature, refuses to coagulate.

traits.locale_text: Göletteki kan kabarcıklanıyor ve doğanın kurallarına aykırı davranıyor, bir türlü pıhtılaşmıyor.
